data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Sibiu, Romania know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sibiu, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Sibiu, Romania humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 15 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Sibiu, Romania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 25,394 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Tatar people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Tatar people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Tatar people is yours.
Spirit, teach the 25,394 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 350,352 cultural Christians in the state of Sibiu to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sibiu, Romania. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Sibiu
location.people_groups_list: Bashkir, Kazakh, Tajik, Jew, Romanian, Tatar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bashkir (600), Kazakh (1,000), Tajik (600), Jew, Romanian (2,900), Tatar (3,100)
